nodes.text: Meekah Hozard, Leader of the Blood Tachs

Meekah Hozard, Leader of the Blood Tachs is the fifth installment in the Wizards of the Coast column "Bounty Postings." Written by Eric Cagle and published on December 2, 2008, it provided a bio and stats for the Speeder gang leader, Meekah Hozard.
